action.name: Database
action.helpHtml: Runs an SQL query and outputs the result to controls.

property.name: Query
property.helpHtml: Enables you to define a database query. SQL can be entered within the text area and selected inputs and outputs can be chosen. There is also a capability to test your SQL against a specified database connection.

property.name: Loading animation
property.helpHtml: Displays a loading animation on top of some output controls whilst the database query executes.

property.name: Child actions
property.helpHtml: Further database queries that are run in the same transaction. Useful for populating child records.

property.name: Merge child data
property.helpHtml: Whether to use values in columns with the same name in the parent and child queries to create child data objects for each matching parent row.

property.name: Success actions
property.helpHtml: Sets what events occur upon a successful query to the database.

property.name: Error actions
property.helpHtml: Sets what events occur upon an unsuccessful query to the database.
